name: Spatial Eclipse Starship Trooper 3000 (S.E.S.T.3000)
description:
In space, no one will hear you pew pew...



In the universe of Spatial Eclipse Starship Trooper 3000, a commandant is being hunted...

Face the consequences of fighting against a group of alien hackers, who will force you to downgrade your own ship (and your game wow so meta) to keep going !

A game made in 48h during the ENJAM 2021. Certified without crunch !

Controls : Up, Down, Right and Left arrows to control the ship, Right click to shoot.

Liam "SpaceConcombre" - Game Design, baby prog, cuistot
Hugo "Nooga" - Graphics
Severin "Bata" - Programmation
Dorian "MrDood" - Sound Design, Sound Integration
Louis "Lui" - Sound Design, Music


Thanks for playing !
